name: Ralph Sandbox (Kiro CLI only)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install -y curl ca-certificates; sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.kiro; curl -fsSL https://cli.kiro.dev/install | bash; echo "export PATH=\"$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH\"" >> ~/.bashrc; export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"; sudo apt-get install -y nodejs npm; cd /workspaces/kiro-ralph/excel-lite; if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; else npm install; fi; kiro-cli --version; node --version; npm --version'
